description: Sard Power Stain Remover, Eucalyptus, Antibacterial Soaker 1kg  – Actively lifts protein, greasy and coloured stains!Sard Power - stain remover Antibacterial Soaker Sard loves stains! Don't let tough stains slow you and your family down! With our Improved formulation, Sard Power Soaker delivers stain removal for your family stains. It safely shifts tough stains and is safe for white clothes and colour clothes. Sard Wonder, your ally against stains! In-Wash booster, Effective in all wash temperaturesSard Power is effective on all major Stain types (Protein, Coloured and Greasy)Safely shift though stainsSafe for whites and coloursIn-Wash booster, Effective in all wash temperatures
name: Sard Power Stain Remover Powder Soaker 1kg
